Change Log
===============

0.0.1 (23/08/2020)
-------------------
- First Release

0.0.5 (28/08/2020)
-------------------
- Second Release. New confidence intervals have been added.


0.0.6 (05/09/2020)
-------------------
- Third Release. More calculating details have been added to the functions. Print statements have become optional (verbose paramater added).
